summary: This is an internal FBI email chain from September 2021 regarding a discovery request for the upcoming Ghislaine Maxwell trial. A Program Manager from the FBI Victim Services Division requests that colleagues provide contact information for any communications with victims, witnesses, or their attorneys in the Epstein/Maxwell investigation to be turned over to the U.S. Attorney's Office.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named as a subject of the New York investigation alongside Ghislaine Maxwell, with a trial scheduled for November 2021.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Named as a subject of the New York investigation alongside Jeffrey Epstein, with a trial scheduled for November 2021.

events.title: Scheduled Maxwell/Epstein Trial
events.description: The New York investigation of Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell is scheduled for trial.

keyFacts: The email is a discovery request from the FBI Victim Services Division for the upcoming Epstein/Maxwell trial, scheduled for November 29, 2021.
The request seeks all communications (texts, emails, voicemails) with any victim, witness, or victim's attorney involved in the investigation to be turned over to the U.S. Attorney's Office.
The request has a short timeframe, with a deadline of COB Monday, September 13, 2021.
The email chain shows internal FBI coordination and preparation for trial discovery obligations.
The case is referenced by FBI investigation number 50D-NY-3027571.
